results.name: Parity of A070885.
comment: If you change a(1) to "2", then the concatenation of the first n terms yields the first length-n term of A024629 with positive even index. - _Glen Whitney_, Sep 17 2017
reference: Wolfram, S. A New Kind of Science. Champaign, IL: Wolfram Media, 2002, p. 122.
link: Ben Branman, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Wolfram Sequences
results.author: _Ben Branman_, Jan 22 2012
